name: Resource Manager - Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Spark instance's ResourceManager. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Application Master - Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Spark instance's ApplicationMaster. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Standalone Master - Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Spark instance's Standalone Master. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Mesos Master - Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Spark instance's Mesos Master. Returns `OK` otherwise.
